rows.label: tlk70000055_02_msg0001
rows.name:
Of course I don't know His
Majesty well personally...

rows.label: tlk70000055_02_msg0002
rows.name:
But even from afar it's easy to tell
that the relationship between him
and Adel-sama is a special one.

rows.label: tlk70000055_02_msg0003
rows.name:
Back in Superbia, I never saw His
Majesty smile or joke around like
the two of them do together.

rows.label: tlk70000055_02_msg0004
rows.name:
I wonder if it's because they're
both Drivers, or if the reason
is something else entirely...

rows.label: tlk70000055_02_msg0005
rows.name:
Either way, I admire the
friendship they have. I don't
have any friends like that.
